##### James's pick of important places in Baltimore

1. Johns Hopkins University
2. Bloomberg School of Public Health at the Johns Hopkins University
3. Oriole Park at Camden Yards, the home of the Baltimore Orioles
4. Inner Harbor where the best seafood can be found!

##### Explore them more by clicking on the numbers on the map!
